text: Ballacolla, officially Ballycolla (), is a village in County Laois, Ireland. It sits at the crossroads of the R433 and R434 regional roads, southwest of Abbeyleix and 4km northeast of junction 3 of the M8 motorway. As of the 2016 census, Ballacolla had a population of 136 people. ==References== ==See also== * List of towns and villages in Ireland Category:Towns and villages in County Laois Category:Townlands of County Laois
title: Ballacolla
